title: The Apple Junction Payroll
description: Walking through a wall had never been so easy, not with Jacob Longstreet pulling you through it! But where they ended up gave Pepper cause for concern…right smack in the middle of the Civil War!Realizing she has been a witness to the payroll theft, there is just one minor problem…the theft happened before she landed in this time, and she has no idea who the army is looking for.Working with Longstreet to recover the payroll, they both suddenly realize that they have been double-crossed, and that in reality the thieves are gunning for them!
author: J.T. Lewis
